# Tender Announcement 
### **High Pressure Die Casting Process for Aluminium Alloys**


#### Tender Details

*   **Solicitation Number**: NRCan-5000081844
*   **Publication Date**: July 12, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: July 30, 2024 (14:00:00)
*   **Procurement Method**: Advance Contract Award Notice
*   **Procurement Category**: SRV (Service)


#### Project Overview

The Department of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) invites proposals for the development of a high pressure die casting process for aluminium alloys. The scope of the project includes:

*   Developing a solidification simulator, experimentally validated using two aluminum alloys
*   Conducting pilot-scale high pressure die casting experiments to validate findings and 3D flow models
*   Designing and building a modified desktop die tool, including experimental setup
*   Designing and constructing an experimental die with thermocouples and pressure sensors
*   Conducting casting trials and developing an inverse heat transfer model and control system
*   Preparing reports on all aspects of the project

#### Key Requirements

Materials of interest include Al-Si and Al-Zn casting alloys. The project requires the development of design rules for the die casting process.

#### Evaluation Criteria and Trade Agreements

Note that the evaluation criteria are not applicable for this tender. The Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) applies to this procurement.

#### Contracting Entity and Contact Information

The contracting entity is the Department of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan). For further information, please contact the procurement team via email at vincent.gariepy@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca or phone at (819) 239-9895.

Tender documents are available for download from the Bidraq website at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/42175/acan-nrcan-5000081844-(183188).pdf or https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/42175/pac-nrcan-5000081844-(183188).pdf for English and French, respectively.
